title: New: EXES – twentythousand
body:
This **EXES** song is very very slick – on both the vocal and the production.

Think the chic electro-pop of Oh Wonder and Alina Baraz and you’re in the right ballpark. Having just gone up on Spotify, and already racking up the plays, you’d be best to get on board with EXES now. Check out _twentythousand_ below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
